section.p: This class captures transfusion reaction associated with a transfusion on a patient.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
Indicates the transfusion reaction date.
Contains exactly one [1..1] reactionType with data type Code
Contains zero or more [0..*] dataEnterer, where its type is Individual Provider

Contains exactly one [1..1] date with data type Point In Time
Indicates the transfusion reaction date.

Contains zero or more [0..*] dataEnterer, where its type is Individual Provider
